EmailTemplate.name: RE: Information on Eric Schramm (1348849475.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Information on Eric Schramm (1348849475.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Eric, Nice you meet you via email; I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: David Putt Sent: Friday, September 28, 2012 6:57 AM To: Schramm, Eric (Pittsburgh) Cc: Sara Conde Subject: RE: Information on Eric Schramm Eric, Thanks very much for the interest. I’ve copied Sara Conde from our team who can discuss our model. Best of luck with your early retirement and hope you thrive in the next phase of your career. __________________________________________DAVE PUTTVice President, Eastern Region MBO Partners t: 703.793.6020f: 703.793.6089 c: 703.981.1360e: dputt@mbopartners.com <mailto:dputt@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files From: Schramm, Eric (Pittsburgh) [mailto:Eric.Schramm@hp.com] <mailto:[mailto:Eric.Schramm@hp.com]> Sent: Thursday, September 27, 2012 8:11 PM To: David Putt Subject: Information on Eric Schramm David: I received your name from Ernie Campos from Hewlett Packard and Gina Abate from NTTdata. I am currently supporting a contract with the Department of Justice where NTTdata is the prime. I recently have accepted an early retirement offer from HP effective on October 31, 2012. I would like to have a conversation with you to discuss employment opportunities as a C2C contractor to continue supporting the Department of Justice’s contract. Would you have some time tomorrow or early next week for a discussion over the phone? I have attached my resume. My primary role at HP was a Technology Consultant supporting Fortune 500 and Government agencies. My core competencies include: * Customer Advisor* Customer Management* Database Engineer* Systems / Application Engineer* Business Development* Architecture I currently hold various government clearances including an active Top Secret. I have obtained multiple certifications in Microsoft, Oracle and security (CISSP). Thanks! Eric Schramm, CISSP, OCPTechnology ConsultantUSPS Federal Consulting SegmentMobile +1 412.721.6641 Email eric.schramm@hp.com <mailto:john.doe@hp.com>
